name: rbw-claude-code
description: Python development and productivity plugins for Claude Code

metadata.description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for Python development workflows including uv enforcement, conventional commits, auto-formatting, type checking, and test reminders.

plugins.name: enforce-uv
plugins.description: Block bare python/pip/pytest commands, enforce uv usage

plugins.name: conventional-commits
plugins.description: Validate git commit messages follow conventional format

plugins.name: python-format
plugins.description: Auto-format Python files with ruff after edits

plugins.name: python-typecheck
plugins.description: Run type checking after Python file edits

plugins.name: test-reminder
plugins.description: Remind to add tests when creating new Python files
